title: Hexer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Kill six target players each night. You may self-target.
- Change your defense to Powerful for the night. You may use this ability along with your first but you may only do this once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Your ability requires exactly six legal targets. If there aren't six players to kill, you can't kill.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 800
*When killing five just isn't enough.*
